name: template-next-tailwind
description: Next.js, Tailwind, gill (based on @solana/kit), Wallet UI

scripts.anchor:build: cd anchor && cargo clean && cargo update && anchor build && cd .. && cp -r anchor/target/idl/* target/ && cp -r anchor/target/types/* target/ && next build && next start && next build && pnpm keygen
scripts.anchor:deploy: cd anchor && anchor deploy --provider.cluster devnet && cd ..
scripts.anchor:clean: cd anchor && cargo clean && anchor clean && cargo update && anchor build && cd ..
scripts.airdrop: solana airdrop 2 && pnpm wallet && solana config get
scripts.keygen: solana-keygen new --outfile anchor/target/deploy/anarcrypt.json --force && solana config set --keypair anchor/target/deploy/anarcrypt.json && solana airdrop 2 && solana config get
scripts.wallet:status: solana balance && solana address && solana config get
scripts.solana:config: solana config set --keypair anchor/target/deploy/anarcrypt.json && solana config set --url devnet && solana airdrop 2 && solana address && solana balance && solana config get
scripts.putsch:sync: pnpm anchor:build && pnpm build && pnpm lint
scripts.putsch:dev: pnpm airdrop && pnpm loot && pnpm dev
